populate_db module

populate_db.populate_db(countries, capitals, population, area, density, neighbouring_countries, time_zones, constitutional_form, official_languages, regional_languages, minority_languages, national_languages, widely_spoken_languages)[source]

Populate the MySQL database with data from the given dictionaries.

Parameters

  • countries (list) – A list of countries.

  • capitals (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of capital cities.

  • population (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing population data.

  • area (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing area data.

  • density (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing density data.

  • neighbouring_countries (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of neighbouring countries.

  • time_zones (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of time zones.

  • constitutional_form (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing constitutional form data.

  • official_languages (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of official languages.

  • regional_languages (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of regional languages.

  • minority_languages (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of minority languages.

  • national_languages (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of national languages.

  • widely_spoken_languages (dict) – A dictionary with keys representing countries and values representing lists of widely spoken languages.

Raises

Error – If there is an error inserting data into the database.
